snippet.title: Hardwar Intro FMV
snippet.description: Full motion video introduction to the 1998 PC game Hardwar: The Future is Greedy.  This game is a true gem!  Very cool gameplay, amazing music, and the best intro to a videogame ever!  I will definitely be uploading some gameplay footage soon!
